title: What happens if a Sylas hijacks an enemy Sylasâ€™ ult?

replies.body:
Either nothing (if enemy sylas has no ult stolen) or he steals his stolen ult.
Ex. Enemy sylas stole your teams karthus ult. You sylas ults enemy sylas and gets karthus ult as well.
just thinking of the horror of three karthus all ulting at once.

> [{quoted}](name=Fuhrer Usagi,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=sxABipoE,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-11-04T02:18:03.269+0000)
>
> just thinking of the horror of three karthus all ulting at once.

Look at the bright side; one of those ults will be on the other team.

Nothing.

An error saying "Nothing to steal" appears.
